scripts.libarkts:reinstall:regenerate: cd ../external/ui2abc/libarkts && npm run reinstall:regenerate && npm run compile && npm run compile:plugins
scripts.compile: npm run -C ../core compile && npm run -C ../libohos compile && tsc -b . && rollup -c
scripts.run:sdk: rimraf ./out && npm run compile && node . --ets2idl --output-dir ./out/idl --base-dir ../sdk-patched-arkts/api --input-dir  ../sdk-patched-arkts/api/arkui/component --input-files ../sdk-patched-arkts/api/global/resource.d.ets && cp -r components_stubs/* out/idl/
